attributes.action: Employ Brian Blessed as the new speaker at the house of commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
well, as the title sugests i would like to see Brian Blessed as the new speaker in the house of commons.
He has more of a back bone than the previouse speaker; there is no way he will be made a scapegoat for the politicains misdeeds.
He will restore order to the proceedings because no-one out speaks Brian Blessed, when he bellows SILENCE! there will be silence.
He will restore trust to the house of commons as he is a British icon, a national treasure and generaly a nice, jolly bloke.
Hopefuly he will also grill the politicians  on their misdeeds and help to rid the house of the coruption, or at least produce somthing decent to watch on tv in the process.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
